verbs.description: [ARG0: patriots] [V: showing] [ARG1: interest in trading for demaryius thomas the new england] patriots have discussed the idea of trading for denver broncos receiver demaryius thomas according to nfl media mike giardi the patriots who are active on the trade market ahead of the deadline on oct 30 are checking in a number of positions and players sense i get from those sources is that the patriots are n't fixated on just one player or one position if an upgrade is available and cost efficient mcdaniels pats mike giardi josh gordon new england patriots julian edelman josh mcdaneisl courtland sutton broncos phillip dorsett denver chris hogan denver broncos demaryius thomas browns cd broncos nfl media steelers
